knimeNode.name: DataSource Adapter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Java Code reader DataSource Adapter. ImpressiveCode DePress Plugin Framework.

intro.p: This node can be used to read data from java ".class" file coverage.
To use plugin you need to specify a folder that has a ".class" files. Plugin has searches in the folders and subfolders and analyzes all ".class" files in that folders.

This node analyzes information about every class and method and returns a table with the following data:
Class Name
Method Name
Public
Protected
Private
Static
Final
Abstract
Location

fullDescription.option: The example file is analyzed is at www.antil.za.pl/test.rar
